channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0833|2024-10-17T17:51:31.449Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20test%20studio
item.description:
In Telerik Test Studio versions prior to
v2023.3.1330, a privilege elevation vulnerability has been identified in the applications installer component.Â In an environment where an existing Telerik Test Studio install is present, a lower privileged user has the ability to manipulate the installation package to elevate their privileges on the underlying operating system.

item.title: CVE-2024-8015|2024-10-09T16:06:49.209Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20reporting
item.description: In Progress Telerik Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q3 (10.2.24.924), a remote code execution attack is possible through object injection via an insecure type resolution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-8048|2024-10-09T16:02:57.533Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20reporting
item.description: In Progress Telerik Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q3 (18.2.24.924), a code execution attack is possible using object injection via insecure expression evaluation.

item.title: CVE-2024-8014|2024-10-09T16:05:56.794Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20reporting
item.description: In Progress Telerik Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q3 (18.2.24.924), a code execution attack is possible through object injection via an insecure type resolution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-7840|2024-10-09T16:26:04.365Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20reporting
item.description: In Progress Telerik Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q3 (2024.3.924), a command injection attack is possible through improper neutralization of hyperlink elements.

item.title: CVE-2024-7575|2024-09-25T14:19:30.019Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20ui%20for%20wpf
item.description: In Progress Telerik UI for WPF versions prior to 2024 Q3 (2024.3.924), a command injection attack is possible through improper neutralization of hyperlink elements.

item.description: In Progress Telerik UI for WPF versions prior to 2024 Q3 (2024.3.924), a code execution attack is possible through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.description: In Progress Telerik UI for WPF versions prior to 2024 Q3 (2024.3.924), a code execution attack is possible through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.description: In Progress Telerik UI for WinForms versions prior to 2024 Q3 (2024.3.924), a command injection attack is possible through improper neutralization of hyperlink elements.

item.title: CVE-2024-4357|2024-08-01T20:40:46.481Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in Progress Telerik Report Server, version 2024 Q1 (10.0.24.305) or earlier, allows low-privilege attacker to read systems file via XML External Entity Processing.

item.title: CVE-2024-4837|2024-08-01T20:55:09.990Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20report%20server
item.description: In Progress Telerik Report Server, version 2024 Q1 (10.0.24.305) or earlier, on IIS, an unauthenticated attacker can gain access to Telerik Report Server restricted functionality via a trust boundary violation vulnerability.
